body:
Release 0.13.69 did not compile on Ubuntu 18.04 and it seems many minor bugs have been corrected in 0.13.72 (jan 2021)
according to https://github.com/gdraheim/zziplib/releases/tag/v0.13.72
Now configure is no longer present, the latest relase has to be compiled using cmake.
title: zziplib: new release 0.13.72 is switched to cmake
